profileStructure.accountMeta: 1 account · Parent linking available for teen accounts
profileStructure.hierarchyDescription: OpenAI Account → Age Tier → Safety Settings hierarchy

technicalRecon.subtitle: OpenAI API ecosystem, authentication, and consumer vs developer gap

apiArchitecture.title: OpenAI REST API (Developer) + No Consumer API
apiArchitecture.description: OpenAI operates the most capable AI API in the industry (Chat Completions, Moderation, Assistants, Images, Audio). However, there is ZERO API access to consumer ChatGPT features — no parental controls, no conversation access, no usage stats, no safety settings. All consumer features are web-dashboard-only.

authDetails.label: Developer API
authDetails.description: Organization-scoped API keys. Project-level keys available for granular access. Not tied to consumer accounts.

authDetails.label: Consumer Auth
authDetails.description: Standard web session. OAuth via Google/Apple/Microsoft SSO. No programmatic access to consumer sessions.

authDetails.label: Parent Dashboard
authDetails.description: Parent must log in to web dashboard. No API, no webhooks, no programmatic access.

rateLimitNotes: Developer API: Tiered rate limits from 3 RPM (free) to 10,000 RPM (Tier 5)
Consumer ChatGPT: ~40-80 messages per 3 hours depending on subscription tier
Moderation API: Generous rate limits, free to use, no disclosed hard cap
Consumer web interface: Cloudflare protection, CAPTCHA challenges for automation
No anti-automation on developer API (designed for programmatic access)
technicalRecon.harCaptureCount: N/A — no consumer API to capture

tosWarning.title: OpenAI Terms of Use — Automated Access
tosWarning.description: OpenAI's Terms prohibit automated access to the consumer ChatGPT interface (chat.openai.com). The developer API is designed for programmatic access but does not expose consumer parental control features. Browser automation of the parent dashboard would violate ToS. Phosra's browser extension approach (client-side, user-installed) is a gray area.

overallRisk.description: Extension-based monitoring is lower risk than server-side automation. Network-level controls are fully compliant.

detectionVectors.mitigation: Extensions are user-installed — OpenAI does not block parental control extensions
Cloudflare protection, CAPTCHA challenges. Use stealth mode + persistent sessions
Legitimate use case — content classification is the API's intended purpose
Network-level controls are invisible to OpenAI

mitigationsChecklist: Use browser extension for monitoring (user-consented, client-side)
Use OpenAI Moderation API for content classification (legitimate, free)
Use DNS/network-level controls for enforcement (compliant, hard to bypass)
Minimize Playwright automation — only for settings sync, not monitoring
Cache parent dashboard sessions to reduce login frequency
Monitor OpenAI API changelog for parental control API announcements
Implement extension heartbeat to detect if teen disables it
Consider mobile gap — extension doesn't cover iOS/Android apps

stats.label: Phosra-Added
stats.color: bg-green-100 text-green-700 dark:bg-green-900/30 dark:text-green-300 ring-1 ring-green-300 dark:ring-green-700

gapOpportunities.title: Daily Time Limits
gapOpportunities.gap: ChatGPT has ZERO time limits. No native way for parents to restrict daily conversation time. Children can chat indefinitely.
gapOpportunities.solution: Phosra browser extension tracks session duration. When the daily limit is reached, the extension blocks the page and network-level DNS blocking prevents bypass via other browsers.

gapOpportunities.title: Message Limits
gapOpportunities.gap: ChatGPT's rate limits are technical/billing (40-80 msgs per 3 hours), not safety controls. Parents cannot set custom message limits.
gapOpportunities.solution: Phosra extension counts messages sent per day. When the parent-set limit is reached, the input field is blocked and a friendly 'limit reached' message is displayed.

gapOpportunities.title: Real-Time Safety Alerts
gapOpportunities.gap: ChatGPT has limited parent notifications. No real-time alerts for concerning content, only weekly usage summaries. Crisis detection shows hotline to child but doesn't alert parent.
gapOpportunities.solution: Phosra extension detects crisis UI elements and concerning content via the Moderation API. Instant push notification sent to parent with severity level and context.

gapOpportunities.title: Break Reminders
gapOpportunities.gap: ChatGPT has no wellness check-ins or break reminders. A child can have a multi-hour continuous conversation with no interruption.
gapOpportunities.solution: Phosra extension injects 'time for a break' prompts at parent-configured intervals. Optional mandatory break enforcement pauses the conversation.

gapOpportunities.title: Homework Cheating Detection
gapOpportunities.gap: ChatGPT gives direct answers to any academic question. No built-in homework detection or Socratic mode enforcement. The #1 homework cheating tool.
gapOpportunities.solution: Phosra extension analyzes conversation patterns for homework-related queries using client-side NLP. Parents can choose to: alert only, redirect to learning mode, or block academic queries.

steps.title: Monitor
steps.detail: Browser extension observes messages on chat.openai.com using MutationObserver. Captures visible text, counts messages, tracks session duration.

steps.title: Classify
steps.detail: Send captured conversation text to OpenAI Moderation API for classification across 11 safety categories. Flag self-harm, sexual content, violence, harassment.

steps.title: Enforce
steps.detail: When time/message limits exceeded: extension blocks the page UI. Network-level DNS blocking prevents bypass via other browsers or incognito mode.

steps.title: Notify
steps.detail: Push real-time notification to parent via Phosra app with alert severity, content category, and recommended action. Critical alerts (self-harm) are immediate.

limitations.title: No mobile app coverage
limitations.description: Browser extension only works on desktop browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Edge). Mobile ChatGPT apps (iOS/Android) are not covered — rely on device-level controls and network blocking.

limitations.title: No parental control API
limitations.description: OpenAI provides no API for parental controls. Settings sync requires fragile Playwright automation of the web dashboard. Any OpenAI UI change can break sync.

limitations.title: Extension can be disabled
limitations.description: A tech-savvy teen can disable or remove the browser extension. Phosra detects missing extension heartbeat and alerts the parent, but there is a window of unmonitored access.

limitations.title: Guest access bypasses everything
limitations.description: ChatGPT allows guest access without an account. Guest sessions have no parental controls. Network-level blocking is the only way to prevent guest access.

enforcementFlow.loopLabel: Continuous monitoring while ChatGPT is active

methods.name: installExtension
methods.recommendation: Chrome Web Store distribution. Auto-configure via Phosra account linking.

methods.name: trackMessages
methods.recommendation: MutationObserver on chat container. Count user messages and AI responses separately.

methods.name: trackSessionTime
methods.recommendation: Simple timer tracking active tab time on chat.openai.com/chatgpt.com domains.

methods.name: classifyContent
methods.recommendation: Send captured message text to POST /v1/moderations. Free, fast (~200ms), reliable.

methods.name: enforceTimeLimits
methods.recommendation: Extension blocks page when limit reached. DNS blocking prevents bypass via other browsers.

methods.name: enforceQuietHours
methods.recommendation: Block chatgpt.com and api.openai.com domains during quiet hours via DNS rules.

methods.name: injectBreakReminders
methods.recommendation: Inject overlay prompt at configured intervals. Non-dismissable for mandatory breaks.

methods.name: syncParentSettings
methods.recommendation: Automate parent dashboard. Fragile — deprioritize. Only for quiet hours and feature toggles.

methods.name: detectCrisis
methods.recommendation: Detect ChatGPT crisis UI elements (988 hotline display) + Moderation API self-harm flags. Immediate parent alert.

methods.name: blockGuestAccess
methods.recommendation: Block chatgpt.com at network level for devices without the extension installed.
